name: @subsetcss/vscode-autocomplete
description: VSCode language server autocomplete for subsetcss config
author: Ilya Radchenko

subsetcss.configPath.description: The path to the SubsetCSS JavaScript configuration file that defines the values for each CSS property.

scripts.vscode:prepublish: cd client && npm run update-vscode && cd .. && npm run compile
scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ..
